about_the_game:
Step into the role of a medieval lord in Castleyard, an immersive castle management game where your strategic decisions shape the fate of the realm.

Navigate the delicate balance of power—your decisions will impact the loyalty of your Council, the favor of your people, and the prominence of your kingdom.

Manage resources, train knights, and fortify your castle as you prepare for threats from both beyond and within the castle gates.

Ride to glory in exhilarating tournaments and lead your realm to greatness!





  • Navigate an evolving storyline where your choices influence your character traits.
  • Depending on your decisions, new branching storylines may develop or fizzle out.
  • Encounter dynamic story events including diplomatic conflicts and internal plots that require your strategic input.





  • Interact with a dynamic Council dialogue system, building trust and deep relationships, each with their own unique traits and loyalties.
  • Oversee the construction and upgrading of essential buildings such as the manor, church, farms, tournament grounds, archery range, and tavern.
  • Balance the management of resources like gold, food, piety, influence, and favor to maintain your realm’s stability.





  • Test your skills and gain favor through jousting and archery tournaments.
  • Guide your knights training, equipment, and trusty steed.
  • Reap the rewards of victory and bolster your realm’s standing.

Own your adventure, lead your people, and shape the destiny of your medieval Castleyard!


Inspired by the efforts of other small indie projects, this game is a passion project started by a solo developer. Feel free to reach out to share opinions, ideas, and criticisms - I welcome any feedback.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel 4th Gen Dual Core 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX Series 10
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game can likely run on lower rated hardware, but we can't guarantee the performance or provide support.
